SEARCH
Package Cashier

Class Cashier_Controller

java.lang.Object
Cashier.Cashier_Controller
public class Cashier_Controller extends Object
Cashier screen controller - wires up tables, cart ops, and submits orders. Quick and practical: updates UI via JavaFX and does DB work off the FX thread.
Author:
Akil Daresalamwala

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Cashier_Controller.CartRowView
    Simple cart row model for the cart table (id, name, cost, qty, modify).
    static class 
    Cashier_Controller.ItemRowView
    Simple item row model for the items table (id, name, cost).

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize the cashier view tables and load data. See db.getItems().

    • handleSubmitOrder

      private void handleSubmitOrder(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Submit the current cart as past items and clear the cart. See db.insertPastItemById(int, double, String).
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent source

    • handleAddToCart

      private void handleAddToCart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Add the selected item to the cart and persist to current items. See db.insertCurrentItemById(int, double, String).
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent source

    • handleRemoveFromCart

      private void handleRemoveFromCart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Remove the selected cart row and delete one matching current item. See db.deleteOneCurrentItemByIdAndCost(int, double).
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent source

    • refreshView

      private void refreshView()
      Refresh the items and cart tables from the database. See db.getItems() and db.getCurrentItems().

    • handleBackButtonAction

      private void handleBackButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Navigate back to the login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the ActionEvent source
      Throws:
      IOException - if the FXML cannot be loaded
